arts.ttl: Fatigued Barcelona defender could sit out against Celta Vigo if replacement is fit
arts.sum: According to SPORT, Barcelona manager Hansi Flick is seriously considering giving Jules Kounde a well-deserved rest for their upcoming La Liga encounter against Celta Vigo. The 26-year-old defender, who has been a cornerstone in Barça’s backline, is reportedly suffering from significant fatigue after an intense run of games. As such, he has played nine consecutive […] The post Fatigued Barcelona defender could sit out against Celta Vigo if replacement is fit appeared first on Barca Universal.

arts.ttl: Barcelona’s Balaidos curse – Why Celta Vigo remain the Catalans’ biggest nightmare
arts.sum: Every club has that one opponent that somehow manages to cause trouble, no matter the circumstances, and for Barcelona, that nemesis is Celta Vigo. As Hansi Flick’s side prepare for their visit to Balaidos this Sunday, the numbers alone paint a concerning picture. arts.ttl: Hansi Flick faces major selection dilemma for key position ahead of Celta Vigo vs Barcelona
arts.sum: Barcelona’s long-awaited return to Spotify Camp Nou turned into a deeply emotional moment for both players and supporters. After nearly three years away, the team finally trained in front of the fans again, and the atmosphere was electric.
